report.title: Rewterz Threat Advisory Multiple Juniper Networks Vulnerabilities

chapter.title: Rewterz Threat Advisory Multiple Juniper Networks Vulnerabilities

report.title: Rewterz Threat Advisory Multiple Juniper Networks Vulnerabilities
Rewterz Threat Advisory Multiple Juniper Networks Vulnerabilities
Rewterz Threat Advisory Multiple Juniper Networks Vulnerabilities

chapter.title: CVE-2022-22188 CVSS:7.5
chapter.text: Juniper Networks Junos OS is vulnerable to a denial of service, caused by a heap-based buffer overflow in the PFE. By sending a specially-crafted request, a remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability to cause a device to hang.

report.title: Rewterz Threat Advisory Multiple Juniper Networks Vulnerabilities

chapter.title: CVE-2022-22186 CVSS:7.2
chapter.text: Juniper Networks Junos OS could allow a remote attacker to bypass security restrictions, caused by an improper initialization vulnerability. By sending a specially-crafted request, an attacker could exploit this vulnerability to forward packets to egress interfaces instead of discarded.

report.title: Rewterz Threat Advisory Multiple Juniper Networks Vulnerabilities

chapter.title: CVE-2022-22189 CVSS:7.8
chapter.text: Juniper Networks Contrail Service Orchestration could allow a local authenticated attacker to gain elevated privileges on the system, caused by an incorrect ownership assignment vulnerability. By sending a specially-crafted request, an attacker could exploit this vulnerability to escalate privileges.

report.title: Rewterz Threat Advisory Multiple Juniper Networks Vulnerabilities

chapter.title: CVE-2022-22194 CVSS:7.5
chapter.text: Juniper Networks Junos OS Evolved is vulnerable to a denial of service, caused by an improper check for unusual or exceptional conditions vulnerability in the packeIO daemon. By sending a specially-crafted GRE packet, a remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability to cause the PFE to restart.

report.title: Rewterz Threat Advisory Multiple Juniper Networks Vulnerabilities

chapter.title: CVE-2022-22187 CVSS:7.8
chapter.text: Juniper Networks Juniper Identity Management Service could allow a local authenticated attacker to gain elevated privileges on the system, caused by an improper privilege management vulnerability in the Windows Installer framework. By using specially-crafted binaries, an authenticated attacker could exploit this vulnerability to escalate privileges.

report.title: Rewterz Threat Advisory Multiple Juniper Networks Vulnerabilities

chapter.title: CVE-2022-22185 CVSS:7.5
chapter.text: Juniper Networks Junos OS is vulnerable to a denial of service. By sending a specific fragmented packet to the device, a remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability to cause a flowd process crash.

report.title: Rewterz Threat Advisory Multiple Juniper Networks Vulnerabilities

chapter.title: CVE-2022-22198 CVSS:7.5
chapter.text: Juniper Networks Junos OS is vulnerable to a denial of service, caused by an access of uninitialized pointer vulnerability in the SIP ALG. By sending a specially-crafted request, an attacker could exploit this vulnerability to cause a denial of service.

report.title: Rewterz Threat Advisory Multiple Juniper Networks Vulnerabilities

chapter.title: CVE-2022-22191 CVSS:6.5
chapter.text: Juniper Junos OS is vulnerable to a denial of service, caused by a flaw in the processing of a flood of specific ARP traffic. By sending a specially-crafted request, a remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability to cause a denial of service.

report.title: Rewterz Threat Advisory Multiple Juniper Networks Vulnerabilities

chapter.title: Impact
chapter.text:
Denial of Service
Privilege Escalation
Security Bypass

chapter.text:
